scripts.reinstall: cd /var/www/peertube/peertube-latest/ && NODE_ENV=production NODE_CONFIG_DIR=/var/www/peertube/config yarn plugin:uninstall -n peertube-plugin-spexflix && NODE_ENV=production NODE_CONFIG_DIR=/var/www/peertube/config yarn plugin:install -p /home/peertube/peertube-plugin-spexflix
